def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if (b - a) >= k and (b - a) % k == 0 else "NG" 
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b * c)

k = int(input())
a, b = map(int, input().split())

for i in range(a, b + 1):
    if i % k == 0:
        print("OK")
        break
    elif i == b:
        print("NG")


def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if (b - a + 1) >= k and (b - a + 1) % k == 0 else "NG"
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if k <= (b - a) and (b - a) % k == 0 else "NG"
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
